mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelinfo(hotelcode, hname, address1, address2, information, tel, email, name, savefilename, adminidx, locCode) VALUES(HOTELINFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hname}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{information}, #{tel}, #{email},#{name}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminIdx}, #{locCode})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM hotelInfo h JOIN locationCode3 l ON h.loccode=l.loccode
